info.termsSection1Text: By accessing and using Namos.ai, you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement.
info.termsSection2Text: Permission is granted to temporarily use Namos.ai for personal, non-commercial transitory viewing only. This is the grant of a license, not a transfer of title, and under this license you may not:
info.termsSection2Point2: Use the materials for any commercial purpose
info.termsSection2Point3: Attempt to reverse engineer any software
info.termsSection2Point4: Remove any copyright or proprietary notations
info.termsSection3Text: The materials on Namos.ai are provided on an 'as is' basis. Namos.ai makes no warranties, expressed or implied, and hereby disclaims and negates all other warranties including, without limitation, implied warranties or conditions of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, or non-infringement of intellectual property or other violation of rights.
info.termsSection4Text: In no event shall Namos.ai or its suppliers be liable for any damages (including, without limitation, damages for loss of data or profit, or due to business interruption) arising out of the use or inability to use the materials on Namos.ai, even if Namos.ai or a Namos.ai authorized representative has been notified orally or in writing of the possibility of such damage.
info.termsSection5Text: The materials appearing on Namos.ai could include technical, typographical, or photographic errors. Namos.ai does not warrant that any of the materials on its website are accurate, complete, or current. Namos.ai may make changes to the materials contained on its website at any time without notice.
info.termsSection6Text: Namos.ai has not reviewed all of the sites linked to its website and is not responsible for the contents of any such linked site. The inclusion of any link does not imply endorsement by Namos.ai of the site. Use of any such linked website is at the user's own risk.
info.termsSection7Text: Namos.ai may revise these terms of service for its website at any time without notice. By using this website you are agreeing to be bound by the then current version of these terms of service.
info.termsSection8Text: These terms and conditions are governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of Saudi Arabia and you irrevocably submit to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts in that location.
info.failedToSend: Failed to send message. Please try again.
info.allPlansInclude: All plans include access to our AI legal assistant and contract generation features.
info.featuresSubtitle: Everything you need for legal assistance
info.faq1Answer: Namos.ai is an AI-powered legal assistant that helps you with legal consultations, contract generation, and document management. Get instant legal advice and generate professional contracts in minutes.
info.faq2Question: How does the AI consultation work?
info.faq2Answer: Simply type your legal question in the chat, and our AI assistant will provide you with relevant legal information and guidance based on Saudi Arabian law.
info.faq3Answer: Yes, we use enterprise-grade security measures to protect your data. All communications are encrypted, and we comply with data protection regulations.
info.faq4Answer: Namos.ai uses a credit-based system. Each AI consultation costs 10 credits. You can purchase credit packages from the Credits section.
info.faq5Answer: Yes, you can generate various types of legal contracts using our contract generation feature. Simply select the contract type and provide the required information.
info.faq6Answer: Namos.ai supports both Arabic and English. You can switch between languages in your profile settings.
info.faq7Question: How accurate is the legal advice?
info.faq7Answer: Our AI is trained on Saudi Arabian legal documents and provides accurate information. However, for complex legal matters, we recommend consulting with a qualified lawyer.
info.faq8Answer: Yes, you can export your conversations in PDF, JSON, or TXT format from the conversation screen.
info.feature1Desc: Get instant answers to your legal questions 24/7, in Arabic or English. Our AI assistant is trained on Saudi Arabian legal documents.
info.feature2Desc: Generate professional legal documents and contracts in minutes. Choose from various contract types and customize as needed.
info.feature3Desc: Your data is protected with enterprise-grade security measures. All communications are encrypted and compliant with data protection regulations.
info.feature4Desc: Full support for both Arabic and English. Switch between languages seamlessly and get responses in your preferred language.
info.feature5Desc: Access legal assistance anytime, anywhere. No need to wait for business hours or schedule appointments.
info.feature6Desc: Track your AI usage, credits consumption, and interaction history. Get insights into your legal consultation patterns.
info.feature7Desc: Search through legal documents using semantic search. Find relevant legal information quickly and efficiently.
info.feature8Desc: Export your conversations in PDF, JSON, or TXT format. Keep records of your legal consultations for future reference.
